Hot Spot: SELECT SUM(AMOUNT_PROCESSED),SERVICE_ID FROM TRANS_REQUESTS WHERE CARD_NO = ? AND STATEMENT_DATE = ? AND SERVICE_ID IN ('FIN_CHARGES','RF_FIN_CHARGES', 'DEF_FIN_CHARGES')  AND RESPONSE_CODE = '00' AND AMOUNT_PROCESSED < 0 GROUP BY SERVICE_ID
SELECT MIN(CARD_SRNO), MAX(CARD_SRNO) FROM CARDS WHERE card_category = 'C' AND IS_MAIN_CARD = 'Y' AND (card_status_atm NOT IN ('A') OR (CARD_STATUS_ATM = 'A' AND SRC_CARD_NO IS NOT NULL))
UPDATE CARD_CREDIT_ATTRS SET SCHD_EXE_FLAG = ?, SCHD_EXE_DTIME = current, INTRO_APR_TRM_MNTH = ? WHERE CARD_SRNO = ?

INSERT INTO CC_DAILY_FC_DETAILS (FC_DATE, APR_ID, CARD_SRNO, STATEMENT_DATE, effective_date_from, FC_CHARGES, delta_fc_charges, FC_METHOD_ID, PRIMARY_CARD_SRNO, IS_COMPOUND, BAL_SUBJECT_TO_FC, APR_VALUE, APR_LEVEL, INTRO_EXPIRY_DATE) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

SELECT LEAST(MIN(DR_TR.TRANS_DATE), MIN(TR.TRANS_DATE))  FROM TRANS_REQUESTS TR, CC_TRNS_COLCTN_STATS CCS, TRANS_REQUESTS DR_TR  WHERE TR.CARD_NO IN (?) AND TR.STATEMENT_DATE = ? AND TR.AMOUNT_PROCESSED > 0 AND TR.RESPONSE_CODE = '00'  AND CCS.CR_TRANS_ID = TR.TRACE_AUDIT_NO AND CCS.DR_TRANS_ID = DR_TR.TRACE_AUDIT_NO and CCS.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y'
SELECT FUNC_SET_CONNECTION_PROPERTIES(), dbinfo('sessionid') from systables where tabid = 1

SELECT C.CARD_NO, C.CARD_SRNO, CCA.CREDIT_LIMIT, CCA.CASH_ADV_LIMIT, CCA.OVERDRAFT_LIMIT, CCA.OVERDRAFT_APR, CCA.PENALITY_APR, CCA.NEXT_STMT_DATE, CCA.DAYS_OF_DUE_DATE, CCA.NCONS_NON_PAYMENTS, CCA.APPLY_PENALITY_APR, CCSS.STMT_STATUS, CCSS.STATEMENT_DATE, CCSS.STMT_BALANCE, CCSS.MIN_PAYMENT, CCSS.STMT_PAYMENT_AMT, C.CARD_PRG_ID, CCSS.CASH_ADV_BAL, CCSS.STMT_CA_PAYT_AMT, CCA.LAST_OD_FEE_ON, CCA.LAST_STMT_DATE, C.CREATED_ON, C.FIRST_ACT_ON, CCA.INTRO_APR_TRM_MNTH, CCA.STMT_DAY_OF_MONTH, CCSS.BILLING_CYCLE_NO, C.CARD_STATUS_ATM, CCSS.DUE_DATE, CMF.FOLLOWME_CARD_SRNO, C.SRC_CARD_NO, C.CARD_DETAIL_STATUS, CCSS.STMT_START_DATE, CCSS.STMT_CLOSING_DATE, CF.LEDGER_BALANCE, ( SELECT CARD_SRNO FROM CARDS WHERE CARD_NO = C.SRC_CARD_NO), PREV_STMT.STMT_STATUS PREV_STMT_STATUS, CCSS.PREV_STMT_DATE, PREV_STMT.STMT_BALANCE PREV_STMT_BALANCE, PREV_STMT.STMT_PAYMENT_AMT, CCA.STMT_INTRVL_DAYS, PREV_STMT.DUE_DATE  FROM CARD_CREDIT_ATTRS CCA INNER JOIN CARDS C ON C.CARD_SRNO = CCA.CARD_SRNO LEFT JOIN CC_STMT_STATS CCSS ON CCA.CARD_SRNO = CCSS.CARD_SRNO AND CCSS.STATEMENT_DATE = CCA.LAST_STMT_DATE LEFT JOIN CC_STMT_STATS PREV_STMT ON PREV_STMT.STATEMENT_DATE = CCSS.PREV_STMT_DATE AND PREV_STMT.CARD_SRNO = C.CARD_SRNO INNER JOIN CARD_MORE_INFOS CMF ON C.CARD_SRNO = CMF.CARD_SRNO LEFT JOIN CARD_FUNDS CF ON CF.CARD_NO = C.CARD_NO  WHERE C.PRIMARY_CARD_NO = ? AND C.IS_MAIN_CARD != 'Y'

SELECT MIN (ORG_TR.TRANS_DATE) FROM TRANS_REQUESTS REV_TR JOIN TRANS_REQUESTS ORG_TR ON REV_TR.ORG_TRACE_AUDIT = ORG_TR.TRACE_AUDIT_NO WHERE REV_TR.CARD_NO IN (?) AND REV_TR.TRANS_DATE BETWEEN ? AND TODAY AND REV_TR.RESPONSE_CODE = '00' AND ((ORG_TR.REV_TRACE_AUDIT = REV_TR.TRACE_AUDIT_NO AND REV_TR.ORG_TRACE_AUDIT > 0 AND ORG_TR.REV_TRACE_AUDIT > 0 ) OR (REV_TR.SERVICE_ID = 'PROVISIONAL_CREDIT'))

SELECT {+index (trans_requests trnrq_card_rsp_amt)} min(trans_date) FROM TRANS_REQUESTS WHERE CARD_NO IN (?) AND PAYMENT_STL_STATUS IN ('P','U') AND ISO_MESSAGE_TYPE[1,2] IN ('02','07') AND RESPONSE_CODE = '00' AND AMOUNT_PROCESSED < 0

SELECT (SELECT CARD_SRNO FROM CARDS C WHERE C.CARD_NO = TR.CARD_NO) card_srno, tr.CARD_NO, tr.trans_date, tr.amount_processed, tr.is_cash_adv, tr.rev_trace_audit, tr.trace_audit_no, tr.iso_message_type, ta.transfer_date, tr.is_cc_payment_trns, tr.response_code, tr.org_trace_audit, tr.fee_trace_audit, tr.service_id, tr.adjusted_amt, tr.statement_date  FROM trans_requests tr  LEFT OUTER JOIN transfer_achs ta ON  TR.CARD_NO = TA.CARD_NO AND TR.TRACE_AUDIT_NO = TA.CR_TRACE_AUDIT_NO AND TA.ACH_TYPE IN('1', '3') AND TA.STATUS_ID = 'P'  WHERE tr.CARD_NO IN (?) AND trans_date BETWEEN ? AND ? AND tr.amount_processed <> 0.0 AND tr.response_code = '00' AND (tr.iso_message_type[1,2] in ('02', '07') OR tr.iso_message_type = '0420') ORDER BY CARD_SRNO, trans_date, trace_audit_no

SELECT LEAST(MIN(DR_TR.TRANS_DATE), MIN(TR.TRANS_DATE)) FROM TRANS_REQUESTS TR, CC_TRNS_COLCTN_STATS CCS, TRANS_REQUESTS DR_TR WHERE CCS.CR_TRANS_ID = TR.TRACE_AUDIT_NO AND CCS.DR_TRANS_ID = DR_TR.TRACE_AUDIT_NO AND CCS.CR_CARD_NO IN (?) AND CCS.ADJUSTED_DATE BETWEEN ? AND ? AND TR.AMOUNT_PROCESSED > 0 AND TR.RESPONSE_CODE = '00' AND CCS.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y'

SELECT PROCESSED_STS,REQ_ID,PROMO_ID,PURSE_CARD_NO,APPROVAL_STS,START_DATE,END_DATE,IS_ADMIN_APRVL_REQ,IS_CH_OPT_IN_REQ,SUBSCRIPTN_OPTION,IS_INST_ALLOWED,APR_OPTION,APR_RATE,APR_APPLY_TILL,APR_APPLY_VALUE,USE_CASE_ID,CH_REQ_AMT,CH_APPROVED_AMT,PROMO_PROCESS_FEE,CF.CARD_BALANCE, CF.LEDGER_BALANCE, OPT_IN_DATE,C.CARD_PRG_ID,C.CARD_SRNO, C.CARD_STATUS_ATM, LAST_APL_FC_DATE,ACCRUE_INTRST_FROM, DEFER_EXP_ACTIONS,CH_APR_TIER_MONTHS,APPROVAL_DTIME, CH_PROMO_NICK, DISPLAY_NAME, PR.UNPAID_AMT_FC_OPT,NON_PAY_OPTION,NON_PAY_VALUE,NON_PAY_ACTION,PROMO_EXEC_STS,APR_ID, terminate_date FROM PR_CARD_PROMOS PR, CARD_FUNDS CF, CARDS C WHERE PR.PURSE_CARD_NO = CF.CARD_NO AND PR.PURSE_CARD_NO = C.CARD_NO AND PR.CARD_SRNO IN (?) AND ((PR.PROCESSED_STS = ? AND PR.PROMO_EXEC_STS IN ('I','S','F')) or (PR.PROCESSED_STS = 'F' AND PR.PROMO_EXEC_STS IN ('F'))) AND PR.PURSE_CARD_NO IS NOT NULL;

SELECT DT.ORG_TRACE_AUDIT,DT.TRANS_AMOUNT,DT.DISPUTE_AMOUNT,TR.STATEMENT_DATE,DT.IS_PARTIAL_DISPUTE,DT.CARD_NO,TR.TRANS_DATE,'I', DT.IS_ADJUSTED, DT.DISPUTE_STATUS FROM DISPUTE_TRANS DT join TRANS_REQUESTS TR on DT.ORG_TRACE_AUDIT = TR.TRACE_AUDIT_NO WHERE DT.DISP_TYPE_CODE IN ('T') AND (DT.IS_ADJUSTED = 'N' OR (DT.DISPUTE_STATUS IN ('M','X','R','C'))) AND DT.CARD_NO IN (?)
select fc_charges from cc_daily_fc_details where card_srno = ? and FC_DATE = ? and APR_ID = ?
select * from system_parameters where param_id = UseSameCon4Bulk4APL""

SELECT CARD_SRNO, APR_ID, APR_VALUE, EFFECTIVE_DATE_TYPE, EFFECTIVE_DATE, INTRO_APR_VALUE, INTRO_N_STMT_CYCLS, INTRO_START_FLAG, IS_ACTIVE, END_DATE FROM CARD_APR_PROFILE1S WHERE CARD_SRNO = ? AND IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' ORDER BY EFFECTIVE_DATE
SELECT STATEMENT_DATE FROM CC_STMT_STATS WHERE CARD_SRNO IN (?) ORDER BY STATEMENT_DATE

SELECT BOT.BUSINES_OFFDAY_TYPE,CBO.OFFDAY_YEAR,BOT.WEEKLY_OFFDAYS,CBO.OFFDAY_DATE FROM BUSINES_OFFDAY_TYPS BOT INNER JOIN CAL_BUSINESS_OFFDAYS CBO ON CBO.OFFDAY_TYPE=BOT.BUSINES_OFFDAY_TYPE WHERE CBO.OFFDAY_YEAR IN (?,?) AND BOT.IS_ACTIVE='Y' AND CBO.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY BOT.BUSINES_OFFDAY_TYPE

SELECT APR_ID, CARD_SRNO, STATEMENT_DATE, FC_CHARGES, FC_METHOD_ID, PRIMARY_CARD_SRNO, IS_COMPOUND, BAL_SUBJECT_TO_FC, APR_VALUE, APR_LEVEL, EFFECTIVE_DATE_FROM, CALC_FC_CHARGES, INTRO_EXPIRY_DATE, IS_PRTL_GRC_PRVDD, IS_DEFERRED, IS_POSTED FROM CC_STMT_FC_DETAILS WHERE CARD_SRNO IN (?) AND STATEMENT_DATE = ? AND IS_DEFERRED = 'Y' AND IS_POSTED = 'N';
SELECT PARAM_ID, PARAM_VALUE FROM SYSTEM_PARAMETERS WHERE PARAM_ID IN (?)

SELECT {+index(CC_STMT_STATS cc_stmt_sts_pki)} C.CARD_NO, C.CARD_SRNO, CCA.CREDIT_LIMIT,CCA.BANKRUPT_STATUS, CCA.CASH_ADV_LIMIT, CCA.OVERDRAFT_LIMIT, CCA.OVERDRAFT_APR, CCA.PENALITY_APR, CCA.NEXT_STMT_DATE, CCA.DAYS_OF_DUE_DATE, CCA.NCONS_NON_PAYMENTS, CCA.APPLY_PENALITY_APR, CCSS.STMT_STATUS, CCSS.STATEMENT_DATE, CCSS.STMT_BALANCE, CCSS.MIN_PAYMENT, CCSS.STMT_PAYMENT_AMT, C.CARD_PRG_ID, CCSS.CASH_ADV_BAL, CCSS.STMT_CA_PAYT_AMT, CCA.LAST_OD_FEE_ON, CCA.LAST_STMT_DATE, C.CREATED_ON, C.FIRST_ACT_ON, CCA.INTRO_APR_TRM_MNTH, CCA.STMT_DAY_OF_MONTH, CCSS.BILLING_CYCLE_NO, C.CARD_STATUS_ATM, CCSS.DUE_DATE , CMF.FOLLOWME_CARD_SRNO, C.SRC_CARD_NO, C.CARD_DETAIL_STATUS, CCSS.STMT_START_DATE, CCSS.STMT_CLOSING_DATE, CF.LEDGER_BALANCE, ( SELECT CARD_SRNO FROM CARDS WHERE CARD_NO = C.SRC_CARD_NO), PREV_STMT.STMT_STATUS PREV_STMT_STATUS, CCA.SCHD_EXE_FLAG, CCSS.PREV_STMT_DATE, PREV_STMT.STMT_BALANCE PREV_STMT_BALANCE, PREV_STMT.STMT_PAYMENT_AMT, CCA.STMT_INTRVL_DAYS, CCA.SOLD_CHRGOFF_DATE   FROM CARD_CREDIT_ATTRS CCA INNER JOIN CARDS C ON C.CARD_SRNO = CCA.CARD_SRNO LEFT JOIN CC_STMT_STATS CCSS ON CCA.CARD_SRNO = CCSS.CARD_SRNO AND CCSS.STATEMENT_DATE = CCA.LAST_STMT_DATE LEFT JOIN CC_STMT_STATS PREV_STMT ON PREV_STMT.STATEMENT_DATE = CCSS.PREV_STMT_DATE AND PREV_STMT.CARD_SRNO = C.CARD_SRNO INNER JOIN CARD_MORE_INFOS CMF ON C.CARD_SRNO = CMF.CARD_SRNO LEFT JOIN CARD_FUNDS CF ON CF.CARD_NO = C.CARD_NO  WHERE CCA.CARD_SRNO BETWEEN ? AND ? AND C.IS_MAIN_CARD = 'Y' AND C.card_category = 'C' AND (( C.CARD_STATUS_ATM NOT IN ('F',  'A') AND C.CARD_STATUS_POS NOT IN ('F',  'A')) OR (( CF.LAST_FIN_ACTY_ON IS NOT NULL OR C.SRC_CARD_NO IS NOT NULL OR C.FIRST_ACT_ON IS NOT NULL) AND CMF.FOLLOWME_CARD_SRNO IS NULL AND C.CARD_STATUS_ATM = 'A' AND C.CARD_STATUS_POS = 'A') OR ( (CF.LAST_FIN_ACTY_ON IS NOT NULL OR C.FIRST_ACT_ON IS NOT NULL OR CCA.LAST_STMT_DATE IS NOT NULL) AND ( CCA.LAST_STMT_DATE IS NULL OR CF.LAST_FIN_ACTY_ON >= CCA.LAST_STMT_DATE OR CF.LEDGER_BALANCE <> 0.0 OR C.LAST_STS_CHG_ON >= CCA.LAST_STMT_DATE) AND CMF.FOLLOWME_CARD_SRNO IS NULL AND C.CARD_STATUS_ATM = 'F' AND C.CARD_STATUS_POS = 'F')) ORDER BY CARD_SRNO ASC;
select site from informix.systables where tabname = ' GL_COLLATE'
SELECT memtotal FROM sysmaster:sysscblst WHERE sid = dbinfo('sessionid')

SELECT TASK.TASK_SRNO,TASK.TASK_ID,TASK.TASK_NAME,TASK.PROCESSOR_NODE_ID,TASK.DB_INTERFACE_ID,TASK.EXECUTION_ORDER,TASK.DEPENDS_ALL_INSTS,TASK.IS_EXTERNALLY_DEFINED,TASK.DELEGATE_DEP_MGMT, TASK.FREQ_TYPE,TASK.FREQ_TYPE_VALUE,TASK.FREQ_TYPE_BITMAP,TASK.CUTOFF_OPTION,TASK.CUTOFF_TIME, TASK.CUTOFF_GRP_SRNO,TASK.NEXT_EXEC_DATE,TASK.BATCH_MODE,TASK.ONLINE_DEDICATED_EXEC, TASK.EXEC_STATUS,TASK.MAX_FAIL_RETRY_COUNT, TASK.LOG_LEVEL_ID,TASK.RECORD_BATCH_SIZE,TASK.SLEEP_TIME_MILLIS,TASK.IMPL_CLASS_NAME,TASK.NORMAL_COMPL_TIME_MINS,TASK.MAX_COMPL_TIME_MINS,TASK.COMPL_TIME_BYPASS_ACTION, TASK.CONT_ON_FAIL_AT_SI,TASK.IS_ACTIVE, TASK.CREATED_AT, TASK.LAST_UPDATED_AT, TASK_INSTANCE.SR_NO,TASK_INSTANCE.INSTANCE_ID,TASK_INSTANCE.TASK_ID,TASK_INSTANCE.EXECUTION_ORDER,TASK_INSTANCE.FREQ_TYPE,TASK_INSTANCE.FREQ_TYPE_VALUE,TASK_INSTANCE.FREQ_TYPE_BITMAP, TASK_INSTANCE.CUTOFF_OPTION,TASK_INSTANCE.CUTOFF_TIME,TASK_INSTANCE.CUTOFF_GRP_SRNO, TASK_INSTANCE.NEXT_EXEC_DATE,TASK_INSTANCE.BATCH_MODE,TASK_INSTANCE.EXEC_STATUS,TASK_INSTANCE.LOG_LEVEL_ID,TASK_INSTANCE.RECORD_BATCH_SIZE,TASK_INSTANCE.SLEEP_TIME_MILLIS, TASK_INSTANCE.NORMAL_COMPL_TIME_MINS,TASK_INSTANCE.MAX_COMPL_TIME_MINS,TASK_INSTANCE.COMPL_TIME_BYPASS_ACTION,TASK_INSTANCE.IS_ALLOWED, TASK_INSTANCE.CREATED_AT, TASK_INSTANCE.LAST_UPDATED_AT FROM SCHD_TASKS TASK INNER JOIN SCHD_TASK_INSTANCES TASK_INSTANCE ON (TASK.TASK_SRNO = TASK_INSTANCE.TASK_ID) WHERE TASK.PROCESSOR_NODE_ID = ? AND TASK.BATCH_MODE = ? AND TASK_INSTANCE.EXEC_STATUS IN (?,?,?,?)  ORDER BY NVL(TASK_INSTANCE.EXECUTION_ORDER, TASK.EXECUTION_ORDER) DESC ,  NVL(TASK_INSTANCE.NORMAL_COMPL_TIME_MINS, TASK.NORMAL_COMPL_TIME_MINS) ASC

SELECT TRACE_AUDIT_NO, CARD_NO, TRANS_DATE, ORG_TRACE_AUDIT, REV_TRACE_AUDIT, FEE_TRACE_AUDIT, SERVICE_ID, ISO_MESSAGE_TYPE, AMOUNT_PROCESSED, RESPONSE_CODE, STATEMENT_DATE, IS_CASH_ADV FROM TRANS_REQUESTS WHERE ( ORG_TRACE_AUDIT IN (SELECT TRACE_AUDIT_NO FROM TRANS_REQUESTS WHERE ORG_TRACE_AUDIT IN (SELECT TRACE_AUDIT_NO FROM TRANS_REQUESTS WHERE TRACE_AUDIT_NO = ? OR ORG_TRACE_AUDIT = ?)) OR ORG_TRACE_AUDIT IN (SELECT TRACE_AUDIT_NO FROM TRANS_REQUESTS WHERE TRACE_AUDIT_NO = ? OR ORG_TRACE_AUDIT = ?) OR TRACE_AUDIT_NO = ? OR ORG_TRACE_AUDIT = ?)

SELECT TASK.TASK_SRNO,TASK.TASK_ID,TASK.TASK_NAME,TASK.PROCESSOR_NODE_ID,TASK.DB_INTERFACE_ID,TASK.EXECUTION_ORDER,TASK.DEPENDS_ALL_INSTS,TASK.IS_EXTERNALLY_DEFINED,TASK.DELEGATE_DEP_MGMT, TASK.FREQ_TYPE,TASK.FREQ_TYPE_VALUE,TASK.FREQ_TYPE_BITMAP,TASK.CUTOFF_OPTION,TASK.CUTOFF_TIME, TASK.CUTOFF_GRP_SRNO,TASK.NEXT_EXEC_DATE,TASK.BATCH_MODE,TASK.ONLINE_DEDICATED_EXEC, TASK.EXEC_STATUS,TASK.MAX_FAIL_RETRY_COUNT, TASK.LOG_LEVEL_ID,TASK.RECORD_BATCH_SIZE,TASK.SLEEP_TIME_MILLIS,TASK.IMPL_CLASS_NAME,TASK.NORMAL_COMPL_TIME_MINS,TASK.MAX_COMPL_TIME_MINS,TASK.COMPL_TIME_BYPASS_ACTION, TASK.CONT_ON_FAIL_AT_SI,TASK.IS_ACTIVE, TASK.CREATED_AT, TASK.LAST_UPDATED_AT, TASK_INSTANCE.SR_NO,TASK_INSTANCE.INSTANCE_ID,TASK_INSTANCE.TASK_ID,TASK_INSTANCE.EXECUTION_ORDER,TASK_INSTANCE.FREQ_TYPE,TASK_INSTANCE.FREQ_TYPE_VALUE,TASK_INSTANCE.FREQ_TYPE_BITMAP, TASK_INSTANCE.CUTOFF_OPTION,TASK_INSTANCE.CUTOFF_TIME, TASK_INSTANCE.CUTOFF_GRP_SRNO, TASK_INSTANCE.NEXT_EXEC_DATE,TASK_INSTANCE.BATCH_MODE,TASK_INSTANCE.EXEC_STATUS,TASK_INSTANCE.LOG_LEVEL_ID,TASK_INSTANCE.RECORD_BATCH_SIZE,TASK_INSTANCE.SLEEP_TIME_MILLIS, TASK_INSTANCE.NORMAL_COMPL_TIME_MINS,TASK_INSTANCE.MAX_COMPL_TIME_MINS,TASK_INSTANCE.COMPL_TIME_BYPASS_ACTION,TASK_INSTANCE.IS_ALLOWED, TASK_INSTANCE.CREATED_AT, TASK_INSTANCE.LAST_UPDATED_AT FROM SCHD_TASKS TASK INNER JOIN SCHD_TASK_INSTANCES TASK_INSTANCE ON (TASK.TASK_SRNO = TASK_INSTANCE.TASK_ID) WHERE TASK_INSTANCE.TASK_ID IN (?,?) AND TASK.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' AND TASK_INSTANCE.IS_ALLOWED = 'Y'  ORDER BY NVL(TASK_INSTANCE.EXECUTION_ORDER, TASK.EXECUTION_ORDER) DESC ,  NVL(TASK_INSTANCE.NORMAL_COMPL_TIME_MINS, TASK.NORMAL_COMPL_TIME_MINS) ASC

SELECT LINKS.SR_NO, LINKS.ENDPOINT_ID, LINKS.SRV_CNTRL_ID, LINKS.CNTRL_SEL_CRI_ID, LINKS.CONN_SIZE, LINKS.IS_ACTIVE, CTRLS.SERVER_IP, CTRLS.LISTEN_PORT, CTRLS.IS_ACTIVE, CTRLS.CURRENT_RUN_MODE  FROM SRVCS_CLNT_EPS_COMM_LINKS LINKS INNER JOIN SRVCS_CNTRLRS CTRLS ON LINKS.SRV_CNTRL_ID = CTRLS.SRV_CNTRL_ID WHERE LINKS.ENDPOINT_ID = ? AND (LINKS.LAST_UPDATED_AT > ? OR CTRLS.LAST_UPDATED_AT > ?)
SELECT IS_ACTIVE, API_NAME, API_VERSION, API_TIME_OUT, INSTANCE_ID FROM SRVCS_VERSION_CONFIG

SELECT TASK.TASK_SRNO,TASK.TASK_ID,TASK.TASK_NAME,TASK.PROCESSOR_NODE_ID,TASK.DB_INTERFACE_ID,TASK.EXECUTION_ORDER,TASK.DEPENDS_ALL_INSTS,TASK.IS_EXTERNALLY_DEFINED,TASK.DELEGATE_DEP_MGMT, TASK.FREQ_TYPE,TASK.FREQ_TYPE_VALUE,TASK.FREQ_TYPE_BITMAP,TASK.CUTOFF_OPTION,TASK.CUTOFF_TIME, TASK.CUTOFF_GRP_SRNO,TASK.NEXT_EXEC_DATE,TASK.BATCH_MODE,TASK.ONLINE_DEDICATED_EXEC, TASK.EXEC_STATUS,TASK.MAX_FAIL_RETRY_COUNT, TASK.LOG_LEVEL_ID,TASK.RECORD_BATCH_SIZE,TASK.SLEEP_TIME_MILLIS,TASK.IMPL_CLASS_NAME,TASK.NORMAL_COMPL_TIME_MINS,TASK.MAX_COMPL_TIME_MINS,TASK.COMPL_TIME_BYPASS_ACTION, TASK.CONT_ON_FAIL_AT_SI,TASK.IS_ACTIVE, TASK.CREATED_AT, TASK.LAST_UPDATED_AT, TASK_INSTANCE.SR_NO,TASK_INSTANCE.INSTANCE_ID,TASK_INSTANCE.TASK_ID,TASK_INSTANCE.EXECUTION_ORDER,TASK_INSTANCE.FREQ_TYPE,TASK_INSTANCE.FREQ_TYPE_VALUE,TASK_INSTANCE.FREQ_TYPE_BITMAP, TASK_INSTANCE.CUTOFF_OPTION,TASK_INSTANCE.CUTOFF_TIME,TASK_INSTANCE.CUTOFF_GRP_SRNO, TASK_INSTANCE.NEXT_EXEC_DATE,TASK_INSTANCE.BATCH_MODE,TASK_INSTANCE.EXEC_STATUS,TASK_INSTANCE.LOG_LEVEL_ID,TASK_INSTANCE.RECORD_BATCH_SIZE,TASK_INSTANCE.SLEEP_TIME_MILLIS, TASK_INSTANCE.NORMAL_COMPL_TIME_MINS,TASK_INSTANCE.MAX_COMPL_TIME_MINS,TASK_INSTANCE.COMPL_TIME_BYPASS_ACTION,TASK_INSTANCE.IS_ALLOWED, TASK_INSTANCE.CREATED_AT, TASK_INSTANCE.LAST_UPDATED_AT FROM SCHD_TASKS TASK INNER JOIN SCHD_TASK_INSTANCES TASK_INSTANCE ON (TASK.TASK_SRNO = TASK_INSTANCE.TASK_ID) WHERE TASK.PROCESSOR_NODE_ID = ? AND TASK.BATCH_MODE = ? AND TASK_INSTANCE.EXEC_STATUS IN (?,?,?,?,?)  ORDER BY NVL(TASK_INSTANCE.EXECUTION_ORDER, TASK.EXECUTION_ORDER) DESC ,  NVL(TASK_INSTANCE.NORMAL_COMPL_TIME_MINS, TASK.NORMAL_COMPL_TIME_MINS) ASC
SELECT PARAM_ID, PARAM_DEFAULT_VALUE FROM SRVCS_CFG_PARAMS WHERE PARAM_ID IN (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?) AND IS_ACTIVE = ? AND LAST_UPDATED_AT > ?
SELECT IS_ACTIVE, API_NAME, API_VERSION, API_TIME_OUT, IS_BATCH_SERV, IS_AUTO_REV_REQ  FROM SRVCS_VERSION_CONFIG

SELECT EPS.ENDPOINT_ID, EPS.ENDPOINT_NAME, EPS.ENDPOINT_URL, EPS.LISTEN_PORT, EPS.MSG_COMM_OPT_ID, COMM_OPTS.COMM_PROTCL_ID, COMM_OPTS.MSG_FMT_ID, EPS.DB_INTERFACE_ID, EPS.FAULTY_SERVER_RESTORE_TIME_MILLIS, EPS.VALDT_CONN_POOL_PART, EPS.VALDT_CONN_TIME_MILLIS, EPS.VALDT_CONN_FAIL_ALLOW_TRIES, EPS.VALDT_CONN_FAIL_TRY_TIME_MILLIS, EPS.REQUEST_MSG_TIMEOUT_MILLIS, EPS.LOG_FAIL_COMM_REQS, EPS.DFLT_LOG_INST_ID, EPS.SEND_ADMIN_ALERT, EPS.LOG_LEVEL, EPS.CONFIG_REFRESHER_TIME_MILLS, EPS.MSG_READ_TIMEOUT_MILLIS, EPS.AUTO_REV_MAX_TRIES, EPS.AUTO_REV_THPOOL_SIZE, EPS.AUTO_REV_TRY_WAIT_TIME_MILLIS, EPS.IS_ACTIVE, COMM_OPTS.IS_ACTIVE FROM SRVCS_CLNT_EPS EPS, B_SRVCS_COMM_LINK_OPTS COMM_OPTS WHERE EPS.MSG_COMM_OPT_ID =  COMM_OPTS.MSG_COMM_OPT_ID AND  EPS.ENDPOINT_ID = ? AND EPS.LAST_UPDATED_AT > ?

SELECT SR_NO, NODE_ID,NODE_NAME,NODE_IP,NODE_HOST_NAME,NODE_DESC,RAM_CAPACITY,HD_CAPACITY,MAX_THREAD_LIMIT,OS_TYPE,OS_VERSION,DATACENTER_ID,CURRENT_RUN_MODE,LAST_START_AT,LAST_SHUTDOWN_AT,CURRENTLY_RUNNING, LAST_START_AT, IS_ACTIVE FROM SCHD_NODES WHERE NODE_ID = ?
SELECT ACQUIRER_ID, ACQ_TIME_OUT, IS_ENABLED FROM WS_ACQUIRERS
UPDATE SERV_HORZ_MARKER SET STATEMENT_DATE = STATEMENT_DATE, TASK_ID = TASK_ID WHERE STATEMENT_DATE = ? AND TASK_ID = ?
SELECT CURRENT FROM SYSTABLES WHERE TABID = 1
select attr_id, attr_desc, attr_abrv, is_active , src_table_name, src_column_name, src_column_key_name, src_column_data_type from b_attribute_ids
SELECT IS_ACTIVE, API_NAME, API_VERSION, API_TIME_OUT, INSTANCE_ID, INTERFACE_ID FROM SRVCS_VERSION_CONFIG
SELECT  DISTINCT TASK_ID AS PARENT, PRE_REQ_TASK_ID AS CHILD FROM SCHD_TASKS_DEPENDENCIES WHERE IS_ACTIVE = ? START WITH TASK_ID IN (?) CONNECT BY  TASK_ID =   PRIOR PRE_REQ_TASK_ID
SELECT ACQUIRER_ID, ACQ_TIME_OUT, IS_ENABLED FROM WS_ACQUIRERS  WHERE LAST_UPDATED_AT >= ?

SELECT EXEC_SRNO, TASK_ID, INSTANCE_ID, PROCESSOR_NODE_ID, EXEC_DATE, EXEC_STATUS, FAILURE_RESP_CODE, FAILURE_RESP_DESC, EXEC_START_AT, EXEC_END_AT, TOTAL_RECORDS_PROCESSED, TOTAL_INPUT_RECORDS, TOTAL_OUTPUT_RECORDS, TOTAL_FAIL_RECORDS, TOTAL_AMOUNT, LAST_PROC_RECORD_ID, CURRENT_RETRY_COUNT FROM SCHD_TASKS_EXEC_LOGS WHERE PROCESSOR_NODE_ID = ? AND EXEC_STATUS = ? AND NEXT_RETRY_AT <= ?
select operator_code, operator_value from b_operator_codes where is_active = ?
select criteria_group_id, criteria_group_name, criteria_group_abrv, is_active, grp_dtls_and_or, allow_block from srvcs_clnt_eps_comm_link_cri_grps WHERE LAST_UPDATED_AT >= ?
UPDATE SERV_HORZ_MARKER SET MIN_CARD_SRNO = ?, MAX_CARD_SRNO= ? WHERE STATEMENT_DATE = ? AND TASK_ID = ?
select sr_no, criteria_group_id, attr_id, operator_code, attr_value_type, attr_value, attr_value_to, attr_type, is_active from srvcs_clnt_eps_comm_link_cri_grps WHERE LAST_UPDATED_AT >= ?
SELECT ACQUIRER_ID, SERVICE_ID, SERV_TIME_OUT, IS_ALLOWED FROM ACQ_SERVICES  WHERE LAST_UPDATED_AT >= ?

SELECT I.INSTANCE_ID, II.INTERFACE_ID, I.DB_CONN_STRING_ENC, I.DB_USER_ID_ENC, INTF.DB_USER_ID_ENC INTERFACE_USER_ID_ENC, I.DB_USER_PASSWD_ENC, INTF.DB_USER_PASSWD_ENC INTERFACE_USER_PASSWD_ENC, I.CONN_DRIVER_NAME_ENC, I.CREDENTIAL_ENC_OPTION, II.IS_ACTIVE , 'M' AS DB_TYPE, I.INSTANCE_ID, MAXACTIVE, MAXIDLE, MAXWAIT, INITIALSIZE, MAXMEMORY, REMOVEABANDONED, REMOVEABANDONEDTIMEOUT, LOGABANDONED, TIMEBETWEENEVICTIONRUNSMILLIS NUMTESTSPEREVICTIONRUN, MINEVICTABLEIDLETIMEMILLIS , TESTWHILEIDLE, LOGINTIMEOUT, SOCKETTIMEOUT, VALIDATIONQUERY  FROM INSTANCES I INNER JOIN INTERFACE_INSTANCES II ON I.INSTANCE_ID = II.INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN INTERFACES INTF ON INTF.INTERFACE_ID = II.INTERFACE_ID WHERE II.INTERFACE_ID = ? UNION ALL  SELECT I.INSTANCE_ID, II.INTERFACE_ID, I.DB_CONN_STRING_ENC, I.DB_USER_ID_ENC, INTF.DB_USER_ID_ENC INTERFACE_USER_ID_ENC, I.DB_USER_PASSWD_ENC, INTF.DB_USER_PASSWD_ENC INTERFACE_USER_PASSWD_ENC, I.CONN_DRIVER_NAME_ENC, I.CREDENTIAL_ENC_OPTION, DECODE(II.IS_ACTIVE,'Y',IDT.IS_ACTIVE,'N','N','N'), IDT.DB_TYPE, IDT.INSTANCE_ID  , MAXACTIVE, MAXIDLE, MAXWAIT, INITIALSIZE, MAXMEMORY, REMOVEABANDONED, REMOVEABANDONEDTIMEOUT, LOGABANDONED, TIMEBETWEENEVICTIONRUNSMILLIS NUMTESTSPEREVICTIONRUN, MINEVICTABLEIDLETIMEMILLIS , TESTWHILEIDLE, LOGINTIMEOUT, SOCKETTIMEOUT, VALIDATIONQUERY  FROM INSTANCE_DB_TYPES IDT, INSTANCES I, INTERFACE_INSTANCES II, INTERFACES INTF WHERE I.INSTANCE_ID = IDT.DB_TYPE_INSTANCE_ID AND II.INSTANCE_ID = IDT.INSTANCE_ID AND INTF.INTERFACE_ID = II.INTERFACE_ID AND II.INTERFACE_ID = ?
SELECT ACQUIRER_ID, SERVICE_ID,INSTANCE_ID,SERV_TIME_OUT,IS_ALLOWED FROM ACQ_SRVC_INSTANCES  WHERE LAST_UPDATED_AT >= ?
select * from system_parameters where param_id = TnsTim1sMinExeTime""

SELECT cb.card_bin card_bin, cb.instance_id inst_id, i.instance_name inst_name, i.db_conn_string conn_str, i.db_user_id user_id, i.db_user_passwd passwd, ii.thread_pool_size pool_size,ii.setl_thread_pool_size setl_pool_size, i.is_inst_enc, i.card_mask_opt FROM card_bins cb, instances i, interfaces inf, interface_instances ii WHERE inf.is_active = 'Y' and ii.is_active = 'Y' and cb.instance_id = i.instance_id and i.instance_id = ii.instance_id and ii.interface_id = inf.interface_id and inf.interface_id = ? ORDER BY ii.instance_id;
SELECT TASK_ID, PARAM_ID, PARAM_VALUE, IS_ACTIVE FROM SCHD_TASK_CONFIG_PARAMS WHERE LAST_UPDATED_AT > ?

select * from system_parameters where param_id = TnsTimsMinExeTime""

SELECT ACTION_ID,ACTION_NAME,PROF_ATTRS_GRP_ID,IS_ACTIVE FROM B_CARD_UPDATE_ACTS WHERE IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' AND PROF_ATTRS_GRP_ID IN (SELECT PROF_ATTRS_GRP_ID FROM B_PROF_ATTRS_GRPS WHERE PROF_ATTR_GRP_NAME IN ('NEW_ACCOUNT','UPDATE_NAME1','UPDATE_ADDRESS','UPDATE_SSN'))
SELECT c.card_bin, c.switch_type FROM card_bins c, switch_types s WHERE c.switch_type = s.switch_type AND c.switch_type IS NOT NULL;

SELECT EPS.ENDPOINT_ID, EPS.ENDPOINT_NAME, EPS.ENDPOINT_URL, EPS.LISTEN_PORT, EPS.MSG_COMM_OPT_ID, COMM_OPTS.COMM_PROTCL_ID, COMM_OPTS.MSG_FMT_ID, EPS.DB_INTERFACE_ID, EPS.FAULTY_SERVER_RESTORE_TIME_MILLIS, EPS.VALDT_CONN_POOL_PART, EPS.VALDT_CONN_TIME_MILLIS, EPS.VALDT_CONN_FAIL_ALLOW_TRIES, EPS.VALDT_CONN_FAIL_TRY_TIME_MILLIS, EPS.REQUEST_MSG_TIMEOUT_MILLIS, EPS.LOG_FAIL_COMM_REQS, EPS.DFLT_LOG_INST_ID, EPS.SEND_ADMIN_ALERT, EPS.LOG_LEVEL, EPS.CONFIG_REFRESHER_TIME_MILLS, EPS.MSG_READ_TIMEOUT_MILLIS, EPS.AUTO_REV_MAX_TRIES, EPS.AUTO_REV_THPOOL_SIZE, EPS.AUTO_REV_TRY_WAIT_TIME_MILLIS, EPS.IS_ACTIVE, COMM_OPTS.IS_ACTIVE FROM SRVCS_CLNT_EPS EPS, B_SRVCS_COMM_LINK_OPTS COMM_OPTS WHERE EPS.MSG_COMM_OPT_ID =  COMM_OPTS.MSG_COMM_OPT_ID AND  EPS.ENDPOINT_ID = ?

SELECT LINKS.SR_NO, LINKS.ENDPOINT_ID, LINKS.SRV_CNTRL_ID, LINKS.CNTRL_SEL_CRI_ID, LINKS.CONN_SIZE, LINKS.IS_ACTIVE, CTRLS.SERVER_IP, CTRLS.LISTEN_PORT, CTRLS.IS_ACTIVE, CTRLS.CURRENT_RUN_MODE  FROM SRVCS_CLNT_EPS_COMM_LINKS LINKS INNER JOIN SRVCS_CNTRLRS CTRLS ON LINKS.SRV_CNTRL_ID = CTRLS.SRV_CNTRL_ID WHERE LINKS.ENDPOINT_ID = ?

SELECT CR.CARD_SRNO, CR.CHANGE_DATE, CR.BANKRUPT_STATUS, BD.B_ADV_REASON_CODE FROM CARD_REASON_CODES_HIST CR,B_C_STATUS_DETAILS BD WHERE CR.BANKRUPT_STATUS=BD.CARD_DETAIL_STATUS AND CR.CARD_SRNO=? AND BD.B_ADV_REASON_CODE IN ('BKFL','BKWD','BKDS','BKDM') ORDER BY CR.CHANGE_DATE ASC;

SELECT  SERVER_ID, INSTANCE_ID, FO_SERVER_ID, FO_INSTANCE_ID, DB_CONN_STRING_ENC, DB_USER_ID_ENC, DB_USER_PASSWD_ENC, MAXACTIVE, MAXIDLE, MAXWAIT, INITIALSIZE, MAXMEMORY, STATUS FROM SECONDARY_INSTANCE

SELECT HSM_KEY_INDEX, HSM_KEY_TYPE, HSM_ENC_KEY, HSM_KEY_MODE, HSM_BKUP_KEY_INDEX, BKUP_KEY_CARD_FROM, BKUP_KEY_CARD_TO, APPLY_PAD_CHAR_ON_PIN, PIN_DATA_PAD_CHAR, HSM_KEY_OP_MODE, CARD_RANGE_TYPE, BKUP_RANGE_CARD_BIN  FROM HSM_ENCRYPTED_KEYS WHERE LAST_MODIFIED_AT > ?

SELECT CLIENT_REQ_PRIORITY,MAX_RETRY_ATTEMPTS, MAX_MAKE_CONN_ATTEMPTS, MAX_WAIT_IN_MILLIS, CONFIG_REFRESHER_TIME_MILLS, ALERT_SMTP_ADDRESS, FROM_MAIL_ADDRESS, ADMIN_MAIL_ADDRESS, LOG_LEVEL, MAKE_CONN_TIMEOUT_MILLIS, CONN_READ_TIMEOUT_MILLIS, EVICTABLE_RUN_MILLIS, DEVICE_RESTORE_SLEEP_TIME_MILLIS, MAX_VALIDATION_ATTEMPTS, VALIDATION_SLEEP_TIME_MILLIS, LOAD_BAL_ALGO_ID FROM HSM_CLIENT_CONFIG WHERE CLIENT_APP_ID = ? AND LAST_MODIFIED_AT > ?

SELECT PARAM_ID, PARAM_VALUE FROM SYSTEM_PARAMETERS WHERE PARAM_ID IN (?,?)

SELECT PARAM_DEFAULT_VALUE FROM SCHD_CONFIG_PARAMS WHERE PARAM_ID = ?
select switch_type, bin_length from switch_types;

SELECT ORDER_BY,CARD_PRG_ID,MIN_PAYT_TR_TYPE FROM CP_MIN_PAYT_DST_ODRS WHERE IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' ORDER BY CARD_PRG_ID, ORDER_BY ASC

SELECT TASK_SRNO, TASK_ID, TASK_NAME, PROCESSOR_NODE_ID, DB_INTERFACE_ID, EXECUTION_ORDER, DEPENDS_ALL_INSTS, IS_EXTERNALLY_DEFINED, DELEGATE_DEP_MGMT, FREQ_TYPE, FREQ_TYPE_VALUE, FREQ_TYPE_BITMAP, CUTOFF_OPTION, CUTOFF_TIME, NEXT_EXEC_DATE, BATCH_MODE, ONLINE_DEDICATED_EXEC, EXEC_STATUS, MAX_FAIL_RETRY_COUNT, LOG_LEVEL_ID, RECORD_BATCH_SIZE, SLEEP_TIME_MILLIS, IMPL_CLASS_NAME, NORMAL_COMPL_TIME_MINS, MAX_COMPL_TIME_MINS, COMPL_TIME_BYPASS_ACTION, CONT_ON_FAIL_AT_SI, IS_ACTIVE, CREATED_AT, LAST_UPDATED_AT FROM SCHD_TASKS WHERE LAST_UPDATED_AT > ?

SELECT PRIORITY_ID, ROLE_ID FROM HSM_GWAY_PRIORITY_ROLE_MAPNG WHERE 1=1
SELECT SR_NO, CARD_PRG_ID, STMT_DAY_OF_MONTH, REQ_STMT_DOM, PREV_STMT_DOM, STMT_DOM_CHG_ON, DUE_DAY_OF_MONTH, REQ_DUE_DOM, PREV_DUE_DOM, DUE_DOM_CHG_ON, ARCHIVED_ON FROM CP_STMT_DT_SETINGS ORDER BY 2

SELECT BOT.BUSINES_OFFDAY_TYPE,CBO.OFFDAY_YEAR,BOT.WEEKLY_OFFDAYS,CBO.OFFDAY_DATE FROM BUSINES_OFFDAY_TYPS BOT INNER JOIN CAL_BUSINESS_OFFDAYS CBO ON CBO.OFFDAY_TYPE=BOT.BUSINES_OFFDAY_TYPE WHERE CBO.OFFDAY_YEAR= TO_CHAR(CURRENT,  '%Y') AND BOT.IS_ACTIVE='Y' AND CBO.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY BOT.BUSINES_OFFDAY_TYPE;

SELECT CARD_PRG_ID, SERVICE_ID, IS_ACTIVE, EFFECTIVE_FROM, EFFECTIVE_TO, FIX_RATE, VALUE_FROM, AGE,BASIS,ADS_ID,VAT_AGE FROM CARD_PROGRAMS ORDER BY VALUE_FROM DESC,ADS_ID DESC,EFFECTIVE_FROM DESC,EFFECTIVE_TO DESC
SELECT PROF_ATTR_GRP_NAME,PROF_ATTRS_GRP_ID FROM B_PROF_ATTRS_GRPS

SELECT T1.TRANS_TYPE_GRP_ID, T2.TRANS_TYPE FROM TRANSACTION_TYPE_GROUPS T1, TRANSACTION_TYPE_GROUP1S T2  WHERE T1.TRANS_TYPE_GRP_ID = T2.TRANS_TYPE_GRP_ID  AND T2.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' AND T1.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y';
SELECT SR_NO, CARD_PRG_ID,TRANS_TYPE,DIST_OPT_CODE,DIST_ORDER,IS_MIN_PAY_DIST, IS_ACTIVE FROM CP_TRNS_DST_ORDS WHERE IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' ORDER BY DIST_ORDER
SELECT UNIQUE CARD_PRG_ID FROM CARD_REWARDS
SELECT METRO_CONS_CODE,CONS_CODE_DESC,IS_ACTIVE FROM B_METRO_CONS_FLAGS WHERE IS_ACTIVE = 'Y'

SELECT CARD_PRG_ID, MIN_PAY_CALC_ORDER, MIN_PAY_CALC_TYPE, MIN_PAYMNT_THRSHLD, MIN_PAYMNT_PERC, AD_FC_IN_MN_PAY, AD_TFEES_IN_MN_PAY, AD_OD_IN_MN_PAY, AD_LP_IN_MN_PAY, AD_PRV_MP_IN_MN_PY, ADD_INSR_FEE_IN_MP, AD_CA_IN_MN_PAY, AD_PUR_IN_MN_PAY, AD_OVLMT_IN_MN_PAY, AD_VAT_IN_MN_PAY, INC_INST_MIN_PYMT, ← INC_UPFRONT_CHARGES_MIN_PAYT FROM CP_SEC_MIN_PAY_OPTS
SELECT SERVICE_CODE||IS_DECLINE_FLOW AS MAPKEY,TRANS_TIME_COL TIME_COL FROM TRANS_TIMES_B
SELECT DBIT_MAP_ID,LAST_UPDATED_AT FROM OJ_B_CACHE_DBIT_MAPS WHERE DBIT_MAP_ID IN ('trans_times_b','system_parameters','srvc_task_time_b') order by 1
SELECT interface_id, log_usage_stats FROM interfaces WHERE interface_id in (?,?)
SELECT TASK_ID, TRANS_TIME1S_COL FROM SRVC_TASK_TIME_B WHERE IS_ACTIVE =?
SELECT SR_NO, CUTOFF_GRP_SRNO, TIME_FROM, TIME_TO, ALLOW_BLOCK_OPTION, IS_ACTIVE FROM SCHD_TASK_MULTI_CUTOFF1S WHERE LAST_UPDATED_AT > ?
SELECT RESP_CODE FROM FRAUD_RESP_CODES
SELECT CURRENT FROM SYSMASTER:SYSDUAL
